mdRecord.dcterms:title: Plantation and farm instruction, regulation, record, inventory and account book: For the use of the manager on the estate of <Liberty Hall>, and for the better ordering and management of plantation and farm business in many particulars
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: J.W. Randolph & Co.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Liberty Hall" is handwritten on title page on the blank line supplied by the printer.
A printed account book, with a few manuscript diary-type entries for Cabell family estates Liberty Hall and Laneville, dated 1861, 1862 (on end flyleaf), 1863, 1870-71.
Yellow lining papers contain publisher's advertisements for "Books for Farmers."
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Original brown/pink marbled boards, with calf backstrip, and printed paper label on cover. With newspaper clippings related to sugar cane pasted on front endpaprs
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Cable family
Liberty Hall (Estate : Nelson County, Va.)
Laneville (Estate : Nelson County, Va.)
Farm management--Virginia--Nelson County.
Agriculture--Accounting.
